desc.P: Mario's Mystery Meat is a ROM hack of Super Mario World made by Vinesauce viewer 'Eminus'. This game takes all of the best Vinesauce references and mashes them into a story that follows Sponge as he goes on an adventure to find meat for spaghetti. Click or Tap the images for more info!!!

P: Mario and Luigi have an endless supply of spaghetti. However, they always end up lacking meat.

desc.P: Level transitions are a big part of what make this a unique experience. Here is a list of Level transitions. navigate to an image for a more in depth description.

P: The first transition. Entering the meat. Will finding meat for Spaghetti be your only quest?
After a short quiz with the 5 headed duck, you enter a closet to the Smile ghost living in meat.
You fall through howard the duck...
You exit meat you entered in the beginning via Mr. Dinks spaghetti.
After the Earthbound segment, you enter the spaghetti chasing the meat you just exited, all for your spaghetti.
Ending the spaghetti zone leads to a point and click childrens game interface. We think the meat is causing visual hallucinations.
This level is in itself a transition. You cannot win. You are chased by fire until the bitter end, which ends up being nothing but a horrible nightmare for Sponge.
Plot line change, after you exit Chatland, you have to fight their invading army and save their princess. The transition is in the form of a image slideshow.
Finishing the UN Squadron section and defending Chatland brings you to your final task, save the princes by finding and destroying vineRizon and meat...

desc.P: This Youtube video is a compilation of all songs that are used in Mario's Mystery Meat. The soundtrack is full of a variety of genres to fit a certain mood each level tries to have.

songNames: Legend of Zelda ALLTP - Pink Rabbit
Legend of Zelda Links Awakening - Tail Cave
Final Fantasy V - Beyond the Deep Blue Sea
Super Mario Bros 2 - Pick a character (Bruh Mix)
Super Mario RPG - Forest Maze (PWM Demo)
Rudra no Hihou - The Spirit Chaser

desc.P: Supra Binyot Lande is a comedic fan made game that follows Vinny Vinesauce as he adventures across the world. Each level, Vinny gains new power items and has to fight his enemies. Click or Tap the images for more info!!!

P: The start screen to Vinny's adventure.
This is the developer explaining the reason he made this game in Vinny's signature character accent. This accent is used a lot throughout the game.

desc.P: The level design in this game is reminiscent of an MS-paint drawing... crude at best, but it does the Vinesauce memes justice. Each level has a different theme and new types of enemies to avoid.

P: Level 1 is a wooded area that features some familiar faces from other vinesauce content. This includes Meat, from Super Mario's Mystery meat. This level acts as an introduction to the game.
Level 2 is almost a rip off of the super mario franchise. It features enemies from the original game, as well as Vinesauce renditions such as a version of mario seen in other vinesauce content.
In this level, Vinny travels to Brooklyn and gets bit by a radioactive spider... Vinny has to swing on his web through some scaffolding while avoiding clowns and collecting New York style Pizza!
Vinny travels to a bee hive. Having lost his spider powers, he has to platform around vineRizon and bees that fly around him.
Level 5 is a kart racing level. Vinny has to avoid items that fell on the track in order to get where he needs to go!

desc.P: Between each level, you have to defeat Vinny's evil twin Binny, and also an enemy from his past he knows all too well...

P: The first boss is the introduction of Binny, Vinny's evil clone. In this fight, Binny Challenges Vinny to a Race because he is mad that people keep thinking he is Vinny.
In this boss fight, Binny has had enough and has decided to fight Vinny in combat... This style of boss fighting sets the tone for the rest of the boss fights in the game.
Thinking Binny was dead, Vinny was surprised to see Binny alive again but in the form of a ghost. They have the same fight and this time Vinny beats Binny once and for all.
HETHICC is the final boss... HETHICC has been a meme in the vinesauce community for a long time, and when Vinny was put in a position where he had to fight him the crowd went crazy.
